output_list.criticism: The mintToken function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the total supply. An attacker can mint tokens to any user account, causing an integer overflow and making the contract unusable.

The _transfer function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the balanceOf. An attacker can make the balanceOf of any user account overflow, causing an integer overflow and making the contract unusable.

The transferFrom function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the balanceOf. An attacker can make the balanceOf of any user account overflow, causing an integer overflow and making the contract unusable.

The burnFrom function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the balanceOf. An attacker can make the balanceOf of any user account overflow, causing an integer overflow and making the contract unusable.
The mintToken function is only restricted to the owner, but it can be exploited by attackers to mint tokens to any user account, causing an integer overflow and making the contract unusable.
